snippet: A group of philanthropists led by the designer Diane von Furstenberg and the real estate investor Joseph Sitt announced the project, to be completed by 2016, 500 years after the city’s Jewish ghetto was established.
abstract: A group of philanthropists led by the designer Diane von Furstenberg and the real estate investor Joseph Sitt announced the project, to be completed by 2016, 500 years after the city’s Jewish ghetto was established.

headline.main: Jewish Museum and Synagogues in Venice to Undergo $12 Million Restoration
headline.print_headline: Jewish Sites in Venice to Get a Face-Lift
